In reference to https://www.hl7.org/fhir/profiling.html#CapabilityStatement.rest.resource.supportedProfile
and the client and server "agreeing" on a mutally understood (set of) FHIR profiles to have the exchanged data conform to

will that also work with FHIR Bulk Data API ? (I would hope so)

however I see no equivalence of https://www.hl7.org/fhir/search.html#profile on the FHIR Bulk API operations?

Yup - I don't see why a bulk server couldn't specify profile support in its CapabilityStatement. In terms of querying by profile, servers should be able to support this via the optional _typeFilter parameter - not sure if any do today though :)
Wat are the Bulk Data IG recommended Profiles, their versions, and where can I find that information?
There are no recommended profiles for bulk data. I'd expect most server in the US to use US Core
Thanks, Michele! I was assuming the Argonaut profiles would be used for the Bulk data.
You should think of US Core as the current day evolution of the original Argonaut profiles.
https://hl7.org/fhir/uv/bulkdata/#us-core-data-for-interoperability provides background on choice of profiles
